UPDATE admin_Member SET DisplayName=@DisplayName, FirstName=@FirstName, LastName=@LastName, Signature=@Signature, EmailAddress=@EmailAddress, EmailPassword=@EmailPassword, IsActive=@IsActive, JiraAccountID=@JiraAccountID, JiraAccount=@JiraAccount, JiraPassword=@JiraPassword, TestRailAccountID=@TestRailAccountID, TestRailAccount=@TestRailAccount, TestRailPassword=@TestRailPassword, GitHubAccountID=@GitHubAccountID, GitHubAccount=@GitHubAccount, GitHubPassword=@GitHubPassword, LastUpdateTime=@LastUpdateTime, LastUpdateUserID=@LastUpdateUserID
ID = @ID
AccountID = @AccountID

SELECT ID ,AccountID ,(SELECT TOP 1 UserName FROM sys_Account WHERE ID = AccountID) as AccountName ,TenantID ,(SELECT TOP 1 Name FROM sys_Tenant WHERE ID = TenantID) as TenantName ,UserName ,DisplayName ,FirstName ,LastName ,Signature ,EmailAddress ,EmailPassword ,IsActive ,(SELECT TOP 1 Name FROM JiraAccount Jira WHERE Jira.EmailAddress=EmailAddress) as JiraAccountID ,JiraAccount ,JiraPassword ,TestRailAccountID ,TestRailAccount ,TestRailPassword ,GitHubAccountID ,GitHubAccount ,GitHubPassword ,LastUpdateTime ,LastUpdateUserID FROM admin_Member
Order by ID ASC

SELECT ID ,AccountID ,(SELECT TOP 1 UserName FROM sys_Account WHERE ID = AccountID) as AccountName ,TenantID ,(SELECT TOP 1 Name FROM sys_Tenant WHERE ID = TenantID) as TenantName ,UserName ,DisplayName ,FirstName ,LastName ,Signature ,EmailAddress ,EmailPassword ,IsActive ,(SELECT TOP 1 Name FROM JiraAccount Jira WHERE Jira.EmailAddress=EmailAddress) as JiraAccountID ,JiraAccount ,JiraPassword ,TestRailAccountID ,TestRailAccount ,TestRailPassword ,GitHubAccountID ,GitHubAccount ,GitHubPassword ,LastUpdateTime ,LastUpdateUserID FROM admin_Member
Order by ID ASC
